text:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone know when we will receive our grades and certificates for Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations? It has been 3 weeks, and I have not received mine yet.

Hi <@U07198R7G0Y>,
i have the same issue with the approval of the CMS for Developers Cert, I'm currently writing to the support at <mailto:academy@HubSpot.com|academy@HubSpot.com>.
It seems like a great idea. I have to do that as well.

Hello everyone. Thank you for your patience as we get through the grading queue. Due to the Global Week of Rest and some personnel changes, we are working through the practicum queues as fast as we can. If you have any questions regarding your practicums, please email <mailto:developerpracticums@HubSpot.com|developerpracticums@HubSpot.com> for assistance. The team is aware of the queue and are working diligently to grade your practicums. Again, we appreciate your patience through this.

Thank you
I have received my grading and certificate :clap:
